Interface oracle.html.IVAlign

Interface oracle.html.IVAlign

public interface IVAlign
extends Object
Vertical Alignment Attributes

BASELINE
(Apply to TableCell only) All cells in the same row with valign=baseline shoudl be vertically positioned so that the first text line in each cell occur on a common baseline.
BOTTOM
Align to the bottom
MAX
MIDDLE
Align in the middle vertically
MIN
NONE
No Vertical Alignment Attribute specified
Str
A String Array for the Attribute Values
TOP
Align to the top

MIN 
  public final static int MIN
MAX 
  public final static int MAX
NONE 
  public final static int NONE
No Vertical Alignment Attribute specified
TOP 
  public final static int TOP
Align to the top
MIDDLE 
  public final static int MIDDLE
Align in the middle vertically
BOTTOM 
  public final static int BOTTOM
Align to the bottom
BASELINE 
  public final static int BASELINE
(Apply to TableCell only) All cells in the same row with valign=baseline shoudl be vertically positioned so that the first text line in each cell occur on a common baseline. The constraint does not apply to subsequent text lines in these cells.
See Also:
TableCell
Str 
  public final static String Str[]
A String Array for the Attribute Values
